bid(address).details: Allows to send a bid to the auction.

params.receiver: Bid will be assigned to this address if set.

calcCurrentTokenPrice().details: Calculates current token price in ETH.

calcTokenPrice().details: Calculates token price in ETH. Drops every second.

calcUnsoldTokens().details: Return tokens not sold yet in the auction.

returns._0: returns number of tokens in the token unit

changeSettings(uint256,uint256).details: Changes auction starting price and start price factor before auction is started.

claimTokens(address).details: Claims tokens for bidder after auction.

params.receiver: Tokens will be assigned to this address if set.

getMaxTokens().details: Returns number of Tokens used in this auction.

updateStage().details: Returns correct stage, even if a function with timedTransitions modifier has not yet been called yet.
